price: 66. (Ibraahiim) wuxuu yidhi: “Ma waxaad caabudeysaan Alle sokadi waxaan waxba idin tari karin waxbana idin yeeli karin?
arabic: قَالَ أَفَتَعۡبُدُونَ مِن دُونِ ٱللَّهِ مَا لَا يَنفَعُكُمۡ شَيۡـٔٗا وَلَا يَضُرُّكُمۡ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: qāla afataʿbudūna min dūni al-lahi mā lā yanfaʿukum shayan walā yaḍurrukum
